overview:
Ross Williams is a leading web entrepreneur. With over 17 years experience in developing commercially successful web businesses, he is the well known co-founder and CEO of Global Personals Limited, Europe’s largest privately owned online dating and social discovery business with annualized revenues in excess of $74m.

Launching the business in 2003, Global Personals Ltd owns and operates an online dating portfolio that includes brands Singles365.com, DatingAgency.com and JustSingleParents.com; whilst B2B service WhiteLabelDating.com, offers a platform for brands and individuals to power their own dating sites, currently including The Independent, Bauer Media and PlentyMoreFish as partners.

In its nine years of operating, the company has welcomed over 16 million members, signed 1,500 partners and launched over 7,000 sites across 5 networks in 7 countries (South Africa, Canada, USA, Australia, New Zealand, Ireland and the UK).

.

funding_round.source_description: NYC Startup Fluidinfo Raises $800K From Hotshot Investors
